rule.name: dynamic_MilestoneField
rule.definition: = load( local!milestoneField_label: "label", local!milestoneField_instructions: "instructions", local!milestoneField_steps: "[Step 1][Step 2][Step 3][Step 4]", local!milestoneField_active: 1, with( #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayoutColumns"( label: "Dynamic Sail Component", columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Label", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Label value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!milestoneField_label, saveInto: local!milestoneField_label ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Instructions", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Instructions value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!milestoneField_instructions, saveInto: local!milestoneField_instructions ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Steps", instructions: "Enter Steps in boxes [], eg. [step5][step6][etc..]", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!milestoneField_steps, saveInto: local!milestoneField_steps ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Active", instructions: "Enter number of pre-selected choice for the dynamic Active value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!milestoneField_active, saveInto: local!milestoneField_active ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_milestoneField"( label: local!milestoneField_label, instructions: local!milestoneField_instructions, steps: extract(local!milestoneField_steps,"[","]"), active: tointeger(local!milestoneField_active) ) } ) } ) ) )
